toast.ip_check_please_wait: Please wait a few seconds to retry the check!
toast.ir_location: Cloudflare has connected to an IP with an Iranian location, which is different from your actual IP. You can use it to bypass filtering, but not sanctions. Don't worry! You can change the location in the settings using the "Gool" or "psiphon" option.

settings.title: Warp Settings
settings.endpoint_desc: Combination of IP or domain name, along with port
settings.license_desc: If you have a license (each license is 2x)
settings.share_vpn_desc: Share a proxy on the network
settings.dark_mode_desc: Specify the display mode of the application
settings.system_tray_desc: Not placing the program icon in the taskbar
settings.scanner_alert: The scanner is activated if you are using the default endpoint address.

modal.license_desc: The program does not necessarily need a Warp license to run, but if you wish, you can enter your license here.
modal.restore_desc: By confirming the operation of restoring the changes, all program settings will return to the default state and your connection will be disconnected.

log.title: App Log
log.desc: If a log is created by the program, it will be displayed here.
log.error_invalid_license: The entered license is not valid.
log.error_access_denied: The path to stuff was not found; run the program as Run as Administrator.
log.error_failed_set_endpoint: Setting endpoint failed; use default endpoint.
log.error_warp_identity: Identity in Cloudflare encountered an error.
log.error_script_failed: The script encountered an error; try again.
log.error_object_null: The application encountered an error; try again.
log.error_port: The port is in use by another application; select another port from the application settings.

about.title: About App
about.desc:
This program is an unofficial, but reliable version of the Oblivion app for Windows, Linux, and Mac.
The Oblivion Desktop program is modeled after the user interface of the original version developed by Youssef Ghobadi. It was written, it was prepared for the purpose of free access to the Internet, and any name change or commercial use of it is not allowed.
